body:
Hello guys, some of you might remember me some of you might be new trying to figure out who the heck I am. Well I'm a long time player of McZone and Avicus and once a really active forum member. Now you'd be asking a question like, where have you been (I doubt it :c). Honestly I just didn't have the time to be on the forums and got tired of it. Now I'm back and I'll try to be on every day!

Recently I had made a youtube channel...
I posted my 1st vid yesterday and I was wondering if you guys would like to help get started. I got an intro for all my videos, channel art now I just need people to subscribe and help me! My 1st vid link is here: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uFamAoW-tn4&list=UUP83g0airCGNEdMS6pqi0oQ
I spent a lot of time on it and its a vid on clash of clans 

Much love,
Mysterium Gamer out

title: Hello guys! (Some updates ex. Youtubing)
